QuestData.Title: Offensively Defensive
QuestData.Description: Let me guess, Loti had you kill any trolls dat smelled of blood magic, yes? Well, dat is barely a half measure.$b$bSee, blood magic comes from de old ways, and our people have only been giving in to its allure since de walls fell on our northern border.$b$bCome, we will go for a little ride and patrol de border to Nazmir. Dat is where all dese bad ideas are coming from.
QuestData.LogDescription: Patrol the skies with Hexlord Raal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Wardruid Loti in the Terrace of the Chosen.

Objectives.Objective: Fly the Skies with Hexlord Raal
